description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help all animals of the forest to save their home from woodcutters's greed in this tower-defense game. From one saison to an other, you have to manage animals in order to stop woodcutters from reaching and cutting trees. Beware ! Woodcutters will try all kinds of tricks to succeed in their mission. Be smarter than them ! With your help, animals can keep on living a quiet and peacefull life.
